dmca.title: Washington Post complains of Slate re-blog
dmca.body:
Dear Copyright Manager:

1) The copyrighted work which is being infringed can be see here: http://www.slate.com/id/2160890/entry/2160902/. The name of the article is "12 Angry Psalms" written by David Plotz.

2) The material which is infringing on the copyrighted work listed above in #1 is available at this site: http://myrightword.blogspot.com/2007/03/couldnt-you-just-plotz.html (permalink)

3) Contact information is [private]@washingtonpost.com (Washingtonpost Newsweek Interactive owns both washingtonpost.com and slate.com)

4) I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5) I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


Sincerely,

[private]
Deputy General Counsel
Washingtonpost.Newsweek Interactive
[private]
Arlington, VA 22201
Email: [private]@wpni.com
